data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yao, Zhiyuan, Tavano, Maria, Li, Shuqiang (2013): Notes on four pholcid spiders (Araneae: Pholcidae) described by T. Thorell from Southeast Asia. Zootaxa 3609 (3): 302-310, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3609.3.4
